Store, Peddler, Shiny Object (yellow), Monster drop (night), Maneater drop
Elite store, Pick-A-Choice, Shiny Object (yellow, blue)

Lv1 Lv8 Lv1 Description
It's an ordinary stick. Totally ordinary.
It's ubiquitous!
It's weak, but levels up quickly.
Has the highest starting upgrade limit among all weapons, so it shines
in dungeons like Gen's Turf where you can obtain lots of Blank Scrolls.
Good weapon to insert into Upgrade Pots.

Lv Name Rune Atk Max Ct Exp Buy Sell Info

(Equip 2 bracelets)

7 Vicious Club 11 80 8 6400 900 315
8 Ogre's Club Redeeming 15 99 ∞ 12800 1200 420

item_description

Lv1 Lv8 Lv1 Description
item_description
It has more rune slots than in Shiren 4, but it's still quite weak.
Use it only if you're desperate to activate 2 bracelet resonance.

Lv Name Rune Atk Max Ct Exp Buy Sell Info

(Equip 2 bracelets)

Hermit's Hermitage Blacksmith to
transform it into a Fuuma Sword.

Lv1 Lv8 Lv1 Description
item_description
Decent interim weapon that gains the Rustproof rune at Lv5.
It doesn't have many rune slots, so choose your runes carefully.

Lv Name Rune Atk Max Ct Exp Buy Sell Info

(Equip 2 bracelets)
2 Big Fang 9 15 5 100 1700 595
3 Sharp Fang 11 22 5 600 1800 630
4 Fang Katana 12 30 5 1200 1900 665

8 Beastmaster 20 99 ∞ 19200 3300 1155

Lv1 Lv8 Lv1 Description
item_description
Pretty fast growth, and has more starting rune slots than Bladite and Red Blade.
It doesn't have any added runes before Lv8, so it's easy to transfer to stronger weapons.
Solid choice for Destiny's Descent, since special weapons can't be found on the floor.

Lv Name Rune Atk Max Ct Exp Buy Sell Info
1 Dotanuki - 10 8 5 - 2200 770 Resonance: Wolfshead
(Equip 2 bracelets)
2 Plain Dotanuki 11 15 6 150 2300 805
3 Honed Dotanuki 12 22 6 700 2400 840
